text: Nice food on our first visit! Restaurant was full after some time. Better make a reservation. Family members felt thirsty after the meal hence may not revisit.

My go-to place for chilli crab cravings!

Never disappoints. Service is fast, and food quality is always consistent... even tho it's a reduced/modified CNY menu.

Thoroughly enjoyed every dish.

Food serve fast for a full house restaurant. Gave a 3â­ï¸for service, but staff is polite and friendly. Service staff looks understaff to serve us better. Food taste great, their signature crab is the reason we went and really taste good. Foods Prices and portion is reasonable for small group (3-5pax)

Uncle Leong Seafood is a must-visit for crab lovers! Their chili crabs are outstandingâ€”huge and meaty, with 1.2 kg costing under $100. The chili crab sauce is rich and flavorful, perfectly complementing the fresh crab. They also have different type of crab for you to choose. It's a fantastic value for such delicious seafood. The best worth its money zhicha stall.
